matrix.reconstructionStrategy

Interface MatrixReconstructionStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LaplacianMatrixReconstructionStrategy, RowMatrixReconstructionStrategy

    public interface MatrixReconstructionStrategy
    Defines the interface of a function that maps the results of executing each ITask in a job (as defined in AdapterDistribution.createJob(int, Matrix, MatrixReconstructionStrategy)) into a single matrix.
    Author:
    Antonela Tommasel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildMatrix(Matrix res, Matrix taskResult)
      This method is called after each ITask in a job is finished to add its partial result to the final result.

    • Method Detail

      • buildMatrix

        void buildMatrix(Matrix res,
               Matrix taskResult)
        This method is called after each ITask in a job is finished to add its partial result to the final result.
        Parameters:
        res - the matrix to be filled
        taskResult - the result matrix of a determined task
